title: Resilient Transition
description: Detects when systemic change unfolds at a pace that allows adaptation, memory continuity, and energy efficiency, avoiding chaotic collapse during transitions.
indicators: Adaptation Rate Match: system response times keep pace with changes in control parameters.
Damped Resonance: oscillations are absorbed and stabilized instead of amplified.
Entropy Moderation: transitions minimize waste and stress, conserving resources.
Continuity Preservation: cultural, historical, and structural memory is carried forward through transformation.
